location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 13 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus informs Newnham that on arrival at Muscat he had found that the Government Agent, Goolaub Anendass, was suffering from a severe illness. He had therefore given him leave of absence to go to Scind [Sindh], and placed the Agent's nephew in charge. Stannus also requests sanction for the payment to Goolab [sic] of expenses incurred during his mission to Brymee.
